purpose: Best-fit bijection from tomotope Reye points (edges X±) to N12_58 V4×Z3 projective clock classes, optimized to maximize embedding of tomotope triangle-lines as 3-subsets of W33 rainbow line quartets.

inputs.tomotope_incidence_rule: From tomotope_page16: triangle (a,-b) uses edges {a,b}_- plus {a,c}_+ for c∈J\{a,b}; diagonal (a,-a) uses {a,c}_- for c≠a.

optimization.objective: Sum over 16 tomotope triangles of weighted count of rainbow W33 lines whose quartet contains mapped triple; key lines (22,8,17) weighted +4 per hit.
